Experience optimal comfort and support during your fitness and exercise routines with the Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat. This classic yoga mat is perfect for yoga, Pilates, and any floor exercise where you need that extra cushion and support.

With a thickness of 2/5 inch, this exercise mat is the ideal all-purpose fitness mat. Whether you're at the studio or working out at home, this mat provides the perfect amount of cushioning to protect your joints and ensure a comfortable workout. It's also great for using around the house as a knee pad or standing cushion.

Made of NBR foam, this yoga mat is designed to provide soft cushioning for comfortable stretching and posing. It's perfect for beginners who are looking for a mat that prioritizes comfort.

To make transportation a breeze, this yoga mat comes with an easy-cinch yoga mat carrier strap. Simply strap up your mat and you're ready to go, whether you're headed to the studio or taking your practice outdoors.

Measuring 72 inches in length and 24 inches in width, this yoga mat provides ample space for you to stretch and move. It weighs just 3.11 pounds, making it lightweight and easy to carry.
